name: MobileEdgeApplication
description: MEC Mobile Edge Application resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appDId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifier of the mobile edge application descriptor

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Human readable name of the mobile edge application

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appProvider
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Provider of the mobile edge application

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appSoftVersion
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Version of the mobile edge application

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appDVersion
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifies the version of the application descriptor

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appInfoName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Human readable name for the application product

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: appDescription
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Human readable description of the mobile edge application

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: instantiationState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The instantiation state of the application

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: It indicates the operational state of the object instance
